title: MS IE in Data Science
description: Pursuing a Master of Science in Industrial Engineering with a concentration in Data Science, with a focus on machine learning, data mining, and optimization.

title: MSc in Artificial Intelligence
description: Completed a Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence, with a focus on machine learning, natural language processing, and computer vision.

title: 2nd Runner-Up
description: Secured the 2nd Runner-Up position in the Datathon 2019, a 24-hour data science competition organized by the Dialog Pvt Ltd, in collaboration with Axiata Group.

title: Finalist
description: Selected as a finalist for the ChallengerX 2023, a global data science competition organized by IFS, where participants are required to solve real-world problems using data science.
